meanings.definition: Aneuploids: individuals having an abnormal number of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The aneuploids in the study showed various genetic abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying aneuploids to understand genetic disorders better.
meanings.sent3: The aneuploids at the genetic party were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The field of genetics is like a puzzle, with aneuploids as the missing pieces.
meanings.sent5: In the genetic world, aneuploids stand out like colorful puzzle pieces.
